8/It is not an easy answer to say that there are some humans who have decided they are against the rest of humanity.
7/We've evolved beyond the past and we stand at the precipice of that which holds us all divided or United.
6/ How does one fight or engage those who want to threaten our very lives, our way of life, our children and our future?
5/We must ask ourselves a painful question. It's a question of what is right & what is wrong. What is ethical and what is morally right.
4/We must root out and challenge those who are stuck in the past and filled with hatred for the present and the future of all of us.
3/We are an amalgamation of all the past of humanity standing here broken and fragile and vulnerable and all too human.
2/We stand here in 2016 at the dawn of a new civilization and end of a previous one sputtering out its last desperate calls for relevance.
1/Tragedies of 911, 7-7, Paris, Belgium forces us realize that our only sustainable future is to be more fully one as a global civilization.

16/After each late tiring taxi or maid shift my parents would somehow inject joy at home. In midst of struggle we learned to dream with joy.
15/ They lost all in war & revolution. But America was an endless source of hope for their children. Nothing could keep them from dreaming.
14/ Asked where my joy comes my answer is my parent's love. Its an infinite well fueling a perennial spring. I hit a jackpot with their love
13/ Armed with a positive joyful outlook there is nothing we can't accomplish.
12/ Joyful people view the world in a lens that calibrates their perception with a view towards possibility versus constraints.
11/Our perceptions fuel direct physical impacts on our energy. They replenish our spirit in an infinite loop or diminish our spirit.
10/ We control how we calibrate our emotions- do you find yourself easily effected by events in a negative way?
9/ Every great startup, great family or great group friends I've seen has been fueled by shared joy, common effort, vision and experiences.
8/ Think about it. Do fearful dreams inspire? Or do joyful dreams go viral? Joyful dreams of better days fuel efforts towards shared goals.
7/ Every dream I've dreamed was fueled by joy. When you voice dreams in joy it begins to live in others hearts. Joy is the tone of dreams.
6) Vulnerable joy recasts how we engage with each day. A joyful spirit is infectious and fundamentally changes the destiny of daily events.
5/ Vulnerability is a state of humility that shields us from the hubris that we have nothing to learn from our fallibility. Stay malleable.
4/ Love, joy and happiness are sweeping movements within us. Movements that scale beyond boundaries and spread virally from heart to heart.
3/ Immersive joy is a force that shields us from the daily onslaught of events that could lead to negative emotion-inducing events.
2/ Failure and success are learnable events.  I embrace struggle and pain as they are part of the path to joy.
1/ I do not dwell on failure nor success. I  practice success and failure amensia. I distill the lessons of failure or success and move on.
